document_data.caption: A map showing the Barony of Polten outlined in red.
document_data.name: Barony of Polten
document_data.mainbody: The '''Barony of Polten''' was a county of [[Damara]] ruled by house [[House BelMaris|BelMaris]].
document_data.Description: Polten lay to the east of [[Icelace River]] and included the settlements [[Daleport]], [[Tellerth]], [[Withermeet]] and the capital [[Trailsend]].
